endpoints.description: Retrieve an overview of all water distribution networks.
Create a new water distribution network configuration.
Retrieve details of a specific water distribution network by its ID.
Update an existing water distribution network configuration by its ID.
Delete a specified water distribution network configuration by its ID.
Retrieve analytics data for a specific water distribution network by its ID, including resource usage and efficiency metrics.
Create a notification alert based on specified conditions for water distribution metrics.
Retrieve data collected by a specific sensor identified by its ID over a given timeframe.
Update the maintenance schedule or status for a specific component identified by its ID within the water distribution network.
Generate comprehensive reports summarizing water usage and distribution efficiency across networks.
